name: Monkey Party (EpicJohn Studios)
description:
Play Minigames, Tag, and hang out as a Monkey with your friends!

Monkey Party is a VR and PC Game developed by EpicJohn Studios, inspired by Another Axiom's "Gorilla Tag". You can play Tag, Built-In or Made-Up minigames, or just hang-out, all in the form of a virtual monkey!

Swing your arms around to move.
